turns.en: Challenge time. The customer looks confused and asks: “My bill went up—why?” Respond in one sentence.
turns.zh: 挑戰時間。客戶困惑地問：「我帳單變貴了，為什麼？」請用一句話回應。

turns.hint_en: Your bill may be higher because you used extra data or added services; I can check the details for you.
turns.hint_zh: 帳單變高可能是因為你超出流量或加購服務，我可以幫你查明細。

turns.en: Customer: “I need more data but don’t want to pay a lot.” Respond in one sentence.
turns.zh: 客戶說：「我想要更多流量，但不想花太多。」請用一句話回應。

turns.hint_en: We can switch you to a higher‑data plan that fits your budget—what’s your monthly budget?
turns.hint_zh: 我們可以換到更大流量且符合預算的方案，你的月預算是多少？

turns.en: Customer: “Does this plan include hotspot?” Respond in one sentence.
turns.zh: 客戶問：「這個方案有包含熱點嗎？」請用一句話回應。

turns.hint_en: Yes, hotspot sharing is included, and I’ll confirm any limits for you.
turns.hint_zh: 有，包含熱點分享，我也會幫你確認是否有使用限制。

turns.en: Customer: “I’m traveling next week.” Respond about roaming in one sentence.
turns.zh: 客戶說：「我下週要出國。」請用一句話回應漫遊建議。

turns.hint_en: We have roaming data add‑ons for your destination, and I can recommend the best option.
turns.hint_zh: 我們有適合目的地的漫遊流量加購，我可以幫你推薦最划算的選項。

turns.en: Customer: “Can I cancel anytime?” Respond in one sentence.
turns.zh: 客戶問：「我可以隨時取消嗎？」請用一句話回應。

turns.hint_en: If you choose month‑to‑month, you can cancel anytime without a contract fee.
turns.hint_zh: 如果你選月租不綁約，就可以隨時取消且不需違約金。

turns.en: Customer: “My data runs out too fast.” Respond in one sentence.
turns.zh: 客戶說：「我流量用很快就沒了。」請用一句話回應。

turns.hint_en: Let’s check your usage and either adjust settings or move you to a plan with more data.
turns.hint_zh: 我們先看你的用量，再調整設定或幫你換到更大流量的方案。

turns.en: Customer: “What’s the cheapest plan with enough data?” Respond in one sentence.
turns.zh: 客戶問：「最便宜但流量夠用的方案是哪個？」請用一句話回應。

turns.hint_en: Tell me your typical monthly data use, and I’ll match you with the lowest‑cost plan that fits.
turns.hint_zh: 告訴我你每月大概用多少流量，我就能幫你找最便宜又夠用的方案。

turns.en: Customer: “Okay, let’s do it.” Confirm next steps in one sentence.
turns.zh: 客戶說：「好，那就辦吧。」請用一句話確認下一步。

turns.hint_en: Great—please bring your ID, and I’ll set up the plan and SIM for you now.
turns.hint_zh: 太好了，請帶身分證件，我現在就幫你辦理方案與 SIM 卡。
